item.description:

item.description:

item.title: The labeling of the European Union in the International Maritime Organization is more of a focus than the EU's actual competence.
item.description:
Cathleen Berg, doctoral student, University of Bayreuth Advocate General (‘AG’) Szpunar’s November 25, 2021, opinion regarding a legal challenge from the European Commission against the European Council (Case C-161/20) highlights the contrasting interests between the European Union (‘EU’) and its Member States. item.description:
